path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Techrate/Meta Club Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

findings.title: Owner Can Change Fees
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change marketing, team, and liquidity fees.

findings.title: Owner can change the maximum transaction amount
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the maximum transaction amount, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from the fee and maxTX.
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude certain addresses from fees and maximum transaction amounts, which could lead to unfair advantages or manipulation of the system.

findings.title: Owner can change marketing and team wallets
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify marketing and team wallets, which could lead to unauthorized changes.

findings.title: Owner can change minimum number of tokens before swap.
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the minimum token requirement for swaps, which may lead to unintended consequences or security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change Uniswap router address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change the Uniswap router address.

findings.title: Owner can change swap and liquify settings.
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify swap and liquify settings which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can include in isMarketPair array
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to include in isMarketPair array which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner Privileges: Wallet Limit Modification
findings.description: The owner has excessive privileges to enable/disable wallet limit, exclude from it and change this limit value.
